Name: Vincent
Introduction: Vincent was an ambitious painter who became a travelling artist after graduating from art school at a young age. He thought he would make a name for himself after that, but the cruelty of life kept him from achieving his dream. It took marrying a rich lady to make ends meet.

EvilList.title: Using his wife's property to pay other women.
EvilList.explain: That’s because my wife had an affair first!

EvilList.title: Alcohol addiction and domestic violence.
EvilList.explain: She said some really hurtful things and I couldn’t hold back.

EvilList.title: Plagiarising someone else’s art.
EvilList.explain: I just drew it for inspiration.

EndingHeaven: I will draw you a portrait to thank you.
